output.promotionTnC:
Promote & Earn Terms and Conditions 

PVR INOX introduces the exciting "Promote and Earn" program (Promote & Earn Program) which is a reward based referral program for the patrons of PVR INOX. This program allows patrons to become Movie Promoters (as defined below) by generating unique promotional links for movies and earning commissions on ticket sales made through their links. Whether you are an avid moviegoer or a social media influencer, this program provides a rewarding way to share your passion for films while earning incentives. By leveraging the power of your network, you can drive ticket sales and enjoy flexible commission payouts through this seamless and user-friendly system.

Under this Promote and Earn Program, every patron of PVR INOX, having a registered profile on the PVR INOX App (as defined below), are eligible to refer a new customer (Prospective Moviegoer) to PVR INOX for the purchase of a movie ticket to watch movie/film at PVR INOX cinema.

These Promote and Earn Program Terms and Conditions are in addition to the PVR INOX Terms and Conditions displayed on the PVR INOX App to which Users agree as these can be updated and changed from time to time. 

Users should check for current Terms and Conditions of Promote & Earn Program as these can be updated and changed from time to time. For avoidance of any doubt, these Terms and Conditions shall be applicable to the Multiplexes/Cineplex operated and managed by PVR INOX Limited with the suffix or prefix as PVR, INOX and/or PVR INOX or any other suffix and/or prefix deemed fit by PVR INOX Limited from time to time. 

If you disagree with any part of these terms, you should cease using the Promote and Earn Program.

Definitions

PVR INOX means and includes the Multiplexes/Cineplex operated and managed by PVR INOX Limited with the suffix or prefix as PVR, INOX and/or PVR INOX or any other suffix and/or prefix deemed fit by PVR INOX Limited from time to time.

User means the person accessing or registering themselves on the PVR INOX App and/or otherwise availing PVR INOX products and/or services.

PVR INOX App means PVR or INOX Android/iOS/Windows mobile application.

 Movie Promoter means a registered User/Customer of the PVR INOX App who has generated a unique promotional link that directs other Users to the Promote and Earn Program where they can access detailed movie information, show timings, and ticket booking options and book tickets seamlessly using the link on the Promote and Earn Program.

Customer includes all the patrons of PVR INOX and also includes the User defined above.

Rewards means commission of 2% being given by PVR INOX to the Movie Promoter on the total sale amount for every successful movie ticket sold using the unique promotional link generated by the Movie Promoter on the Promote and Earn Program.

Data means personal information, including sensitive personal information and special category personal data (as defined under Data Protection Laws) about User, which we collect, receive, or otherwise, process in connection with the Users use of Promote and Earn Program and/or otherwise provided by User in accordance with the Privacy Policy mentioned at PVR INOX App and/or the applicable Data Protection Laws.

Cookies means a small file placed on Users device by the PVR INOX App when User either visit or use certain features of the Promote and Earn Program. A cookie generally allows PVR INOX App to remember Users actions or preference for a certain period of time.

Data Protection laws means any applicable law for the time being in force relating to the processing of Data.

 1. User Access and App Interaction - App Download and Sign-Up

  • New or existing Users (including influencers or regular customers) must download the PVR INOX App from authorized platforms such as Google Play Store or Apple Play store.
  • Users are required to create an account by completing the sign-up or login process using valid credentials such as an email address, phone number, or third-party authentication (e.g., Google, Facebook, or Apple ID).
  • By signing up, Users agree to abide by the PVR INOX Apps Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

2.  Profile Setup and Eligibility

  • After logging in, Users will be prompted to set up their profile by providing information, including their name, email address, and contact details etc.
  • Users are prompted to set up their profile after login.
  • A prominently displayed option to Become a Movie Promoter will be available on the Home Page.
  • Users opting for the Promote and Earn program must expressly consent to additional terms and conditions specific to this program.
  • Upon opting in, Users will gain eligibility to generate unique promotional links for movie promotions.

3. Movie Selection and Promotion Link Generation & Sharing

  • Users can browse through the available list of movies, including current showings and upcoming releases and select any movie for promotion.
  • Upon selecting a movie, Users can generate a unique promotional link by clicking the Generate Promotion Link option.
  • Each promotional link is tied to the Users profile and is uniquely coded to track ticket sales and attribution.
  • Links generated must only be used in accordance with these terms and must not be shared via unauthorized or deceptive means.
  • Users may share their promotional links through various platforms, including but not limited to WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
  • Any misuse of promotional links, including spamming or misleading promotions, may result in account suspension or termination.

4. Follower/User Interaction with the Promotional Link

  • Once shared, the promotional link redirects other Users to the Promote and Earn Program, where they can access detailed movie information, show timings, and ticket booking options.
  • Followers or other Users clicking the promotional link can book tickets seamlessly.
  • Ticket sales generated through the promotional link are tracked and attributed to the corresponding Movie Promoter.

5. Commission Structure

  • Movie Promoters earn a commission (e.g., 2% of the total sale amount) for every successful ticket sale attributed to their promotional link.
  • Commissions are calculated based on the net sale amount after excluding taxes, discounts, and fees.
  • Commission rates are subject to change at PVR INOXs discretion with prior notice.

6.  Rewards Payout

  • Earnings are automatically recorded in the Users account dashboard.
  • Movie Promoters can only request a payout once the User has accumulated a minimum of INR 1,000/- in their account on the PVR INOX App. For avoidance of any doubt, the account created by the User on PVR INOX App is not a wallet, the amount reflected therein is only an indication of the amount earned by the User in accordance with the terms stated herein.
  • Payouts can be requested via supported payment methods, including UPI, PayPal, bank transfer, or as credits redeemable for movie tickets or in-app purchases.
  • Users must provide accurate payment details to avoid delays or issues in processing payouts.
  • PVR INOX reserves the right to withhold payouts in cases of suspected fraud or violation of terms.

7. General Terms and Conditions

7.1 Eligibility for the Reward (Commission Payout)


i.    Users must register on the PVR INOX App to participate in the Promote and Earn Program.
ii.    Rewards are payable only for successful movie ticket bookings. Cancelled bookings will not qualify for Rewards.
iii.    To earn Rewards, tickets must be purchased using the unique promotional link generated by the Movie Promoter on the Promote and Earn Program. Bookings made without the unique promotional link do not qualify for Rewards.
iv.    The accumulated Rewards will be displayed in the Movie Promoters account on the Promote and Earn Program.
v.    Payout for Rewards will be made only after the Movie Promoter accumulates the minimum threshold of Rs.1000/- in its account profile as Rewards. Once the threshold is met, the Movie Promoter can request a payout through the Promote and Earn Program.
vi.    To claim Rewards, Movie Promoters must provide all necessary details as requested by PVR INOX. Failure to do so may result in delays or cancellation of payouts.
vii.    Movie Promoters must be natural persons, Indian citizens, and not entities or organizations.
viii.    Rewards will be paid exclusively through digital payment methods such as RTGS, NEFT, or wire transfer. No physical cash or cheque payments will be issued.
ix.    Taxes or levies arising from Rewards are the sole responsibility of the Movie Promoter. PVR INOX will not be liable for any associated legal or financial obligations.
x.    Rewards will not be issued if the Movie Promoter violates PVR INOXs terms or engages in fraudulent activities.
xi.    PVR INOX reserves the right to withhold or cancel Rewards if the Movie Promoter manipulates the system or acts against the programs spirit.
xii.     Participation in the Promote and Earn Program may be terminated at PVR INOXs discretion for non-compliance, fraud, or misconduct.
xiii.    PVR INOX may modify, amend, or discontinue the Promote and Earn Program or its terms at any time without prior notice. Updates will be reflected on the Promote and Earn Program, and participants must stay informed of changes.
xiv.     PVR INOX is not responsible for disputes arising from misuse of promotional links or earnings.
xv.    Violations of these terms may result in account suspension, forfeiture of earnings, and legal action.
xvi.     These terms are governed by Indian law, and disputes fall under the jurisdiction of the courts in Gurgaon.
xvii.    In case of disputes, PVR INOXs decision will be final and binding.
 

7.2 Prohibited Activities

  • Misuse of promotional links, including fraudulent bookings, will result in account suspension and forfeiture of commissions.
  • Users may not engage in activities that violate Promote and Earn Program policies or harm the reputation of PVR INOX, or associated entities.

    • 7.3 Data Usage

  • By participating, Users agree to the use of their data for tracking promotional activities and commission calculation in accordance with the PVR INOXs Privacy Policy.

7.4 Liability

  • PVR INOX is not responsible for any technical issues or third-party platform failures that impact ticket sales or commission tracking.
  • PVR INOX is not liable for any losses or damages incurred by Users due to the cancellation of a movie show or technical issues related to the Promote and Earn Program. All refunds are processed according to PVR INOXs refund policy.

8. Force Majeure Event: 

  • In the event, PVR INOX is unable to fulfil its obligations pursuant to terms and conditions mentioned under this Promote and Earn Program due to the occurrence of any Force Majeure Event, PVR INOX shall not in any manner whatsoever be held accountable for any loss, damage, cost and/or any claims whatsoever to/from the Users and/or the Customers. For the purpose of the Promote and Earn Program , Force Majeure shall mean an event not attributable to the Parties due to which PVR INOX is constrained not to operate its Commercial Operations and/or forced to cancel the Movie Show(s) by the Government order or otherwise and whereby the PVR INOX is unable to discharge its obligations, and shall include any of the following events or circumstances: (a) storm, earthquake, hurricane, tornado, flood, tsunami, fire, tempest, lightening, natural calamity or other act of God; (b) war, act of terrorism, insurrection, rebellion, riots or other civil unrest, invasion, armed conflict, hostile act of a foreign enemy, terrorist action; (c) epidemics, quarantine restrictions or other public health restrictions etc.

9.Disclaimers:Limitation Of Liability

 

THE PROMOTE AND EARN PROGRAM BENEFITS ARE PROVIDED ONLY ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. THERE IS NO LIABILITY OF PVR INOX AND ALL OF ITS AFFILIATES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS AND AGENTS, AND NO CLAIMS FOR CONSEQUENTIAL AND/OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES DUE TO USE OF (OR INABILITY TO USE) THE PROGRAM WILL BE ENTERTAINED.

10. Jurisdiction
This Promote and Earn Program is an agreement between PVR INOX and its Customers, and the respective rights and obligations of the parties hereunder, shall be governed by the laws of India and for any disputes arising therefrom shall have the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Gurgaon.

11. Acknowledgment
The terms and conditions, including all documents referenced herein, represent the entire understanding between us and any User of the PVR INOX App with respect to the Promote and Earn Program and supersedes any other agreements, statements or representations. Headings used in the terms and conditions are for reference only and shall not affect the meaning of any terms. Any use of any portion of the PVR INOX Promote and Earn Program is deemed to have accepted the terms and conditions stated herein.

12. Changes to the Terms and Conditions

 

PVR INOX reserves a right to the right to modify, amend, or discontinue the Promote and Earn Program or any of its terms and conditions at any time without prior notice or liability by posting revised Terms and Conditions on the PVR INOX App. Any such change shall take effect immediately upon posting, unless otherwise provided. Users may view the current version of the Terms and Conditions at any time online at the PVR INOX App terms & conditions section. Users may also obtain a copy at contacting us at feedback@pvrcinemas.com.

User agrees that Users continued use of the Promote and Earn Program after such changes have been published on the PVR INOX App will constitute Users acceptance of such revised terms and conditions. We will notify User and seek additional consent before using Users personal data for a new purpose that is inconsistent with the original purpose for which we collected it.

 

By participating in this Promote and Earn Program, Users acknowledge and agree to these terms and conditions.

hiwn.text: On Summary page before payment, spot the alternate audio box
Select the audio files & complete the payment
Download or share the received audio files
Plug your headphones & slide to play

tnc: Please note that the audio file is downloadable only once
Please note that the audio file can be played post download only once
Please carry good quality noise cancellation headphones/earphones to the cinema

Please start the audio file playback only once you are seated in the audi seat & the movie has started on the cinema screen. The audio file requires the cinema screen audio to start playback and won't play till movie has started
Once the movie has started & the audio file playback has also started, don't switch off your phone and don't kill your PVR app. You can simply lock the phone & the app will run in the background
The app will automatically detect movie pause in interval, and resume playback automatically when the movie restarts post interval. you need not do anything
If you leave the auditorium, the playback will automatically pause until you return back
xlh.alcontent: Simply download the preferred audio file for yourself and also share the relevant files with your movie companions.
xlh.title: How it works?
xlh.content: The PVR app and your headphones would automatically sync with the sound from the main cinema screen to adapt the playback in the language you choose. Get your preferred audio file at booking summary screen.
xlh.head: Now Enjoy movie in the Audio of your preferred Language
xlh.alauinstitleeu: A few instructions for ease of use

alauinseu.txt: The app would automatically sync with the sound from the main cinema screen to adapt the playback, you need not do anything. the audio file requires cinema sound to play, so ensure movie has started before you play the audio file
If the cinema screen audio is stopped before completion for any reason, the playback will automatically detect & pause, and resume once the cinema screen audio commences again
You don't need to keep your PVR app active for this So sit back and enjoy your movie with your customized audio!'

xlh.alauinstitle: You can only play this audio once!
hiw: You will get as many alternate audio files as number of seats in your booking
Please carry good quality noise cancellation headphones/earphones to the cinema

Please start the audio file playback only once you are seated in the audi seat & the movie has started on the cinema screen. The audio file requires the cinema screen audio to start playback and won't play till movie has started
Once the movie has started & the audio file playback has also started, don't switch off your phone and don't kill your PVR app. You can simply lock the phone & the app will run in the background
The app will automatically detect movie pause in interval, and resume playback automatically when the movie restarts post interval. you need not do anything
If you leave the auditorium, the playback will automatically pause until you return back

alauins.txt: Are you in the Audi & your seat
Has the movie started playing on the cinema screen
Your noise-cancellation headphones/earphones are plugged-in & ready

xlh.pbcontent: The PVR app and your headphones would automatically sync with the sound from the main cinema screen to adapt the playback in the language you downloaded.
